params.token: The multitoken which the forwarder should link to
params.tokenId: The id of the sub token from the multitoken which we are creating                 an interface for.

returns._0: returns the address of the deployed forwarder
Returns the stored multitoken address and the sub token id

params.token: The multitoken which the forwarder should link to
params.tokenId: The id of the sub token from the multitoken

returns._0: The expected address of the forwarder

create(address,uint256).notice: Uses create2 to deploy a forwarder at a predictable address as part of         our ERC20 multitoken implementation.

getDeployDetails().notice: Returns the transient storage of this contract

getForwarder(address,uint256).notice: Helper to calculate expected forwarder contract addresses

@notice Returns the transient storage of this contract
 @return Returns the stored multitoken address and the sub token id
